title: Michael Fabricant – 2022 Comments that Rishi Sunak Wouldn’t Win Vote of Members
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Michael Fabricant, the Conservative MP for Lichfield, on Twitter on 23 October 2022.
content:
Rishi Sunak camp desperately ringing round now to try and get the Boris [Johnson] supporters. Why? He already has his 100+.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product
  *[UCL]: University College London
  *[HIV]: human immunodeficiency virus
  *[AI]: artificial intelligence

Because he knows the odds are if it goes to the Party membership, he probably won’t win. He needs a political coronation.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product
  *[UCL]: University College London
  *[HIV]: human immunodeficiency virus
  *[AI]: artificial intelligence
